item.title: [PI] Refactoring ints
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

This application renames ints for you ;D

MediaFire

Int Re-namer.exe

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Then just change:

if(i ==50) {
to:

case 50;

and the ending brace to:

break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Refactoring ints
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

        if(i == 50)
        {
            aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
            class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
            class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
            class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
            class5.aString65 = "King Black Dragon";
            class5.anInt61 = 276;
            class5.aByteArray89 = "A fierce dragon with black scales.".getBytes();
            class5.anIntArray94 = new int[6];
            class5.anIntArray94[0] = 9063;
            class5.anIntArray94[1] = 9064;
            class5.anIntArray94[2] = 9065;
            class5.anIntArray94[3] = 9066;
            class5.anIntArray94[4] = 9067;
            class5.anIntArray94[5] = 9068;
